name: Super Warriors: Awakening
description:
Original flavor, fancy ult
The most authentic Kamehameha, the most shocking combat experience. Recreate the battle scenes of Super Saiyan fight with exploding ultimate skill effect.


Grow as you like, boost combat power
A variety of growth routes, train and create your exclusive and powerful super warriors.


Auto upgrade, easily become stronger
Casual idle gameplay, automatic upgrades while idling, improve super warriors automatically!


Live duel, sprint to the top
PVP mode is on, players compete against each other, and fight to be the strongest in the universe!
